Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory281.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "The enemies are hatching faster than we can beat them! We're not going to get anywhere if we're locked in this endless fight.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv and I will stay here to keep the path open. Lucia, take Commandant and breach the encirclement and get to the Core!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "That's right, Lee and I can both support you with ranged attacks, so you can make use of your explosive capabilities to get through!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia is about to say something, but she just nods after seeing the looks on their faces.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "In that case, I'll be counting on you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, how do you feel about a little jog?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You tap your chest with your hand in a laid-back manner, giving her your approval. Lucia nods at your response, then readjusts her grip on her katana.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Another wave of Hetero-Creatures approaching!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We'll let Liv and Lee take care of here. Commandant, let's keep going!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Despite the many enemies ahead of her, Lucia knows the bullets and beams coming from her teammates will clear her way.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory278.png'}
{3: 'While Alpha clashes with Gabriel, Roland arrives at an underground area on the other side of the Core Area.'}
{3: "The Hetero-Creatures standing in his way attack the sudden invader, only to be crushed into pieces by Roland's glistening chain blade."}
{3: 'Roland spits out the vital fluid stuck in his throat, silently watching the silent monster standing in front of him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashen Hetero-Creature', 3: '...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Oh, here you are. Gabriel's hidden you here, as expected.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Alpha's stalling Gabriel, so I took the opportunity to locate this place. I wonder how it's going there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Well, now's not the time to worry.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The ashen Hetero-Creature floats slightly above the ground, quiet and still, looking almost like a statue.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Even though he doesn't trust me completely... I've managed to get enough information from Gabriel to find out where you're staying.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "He's a cautious sort of guy, not the kind of person who'd only have one control terminal for the Polyphage. You're his insurance policy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Luckily, I've been keeping tabs on him. Otherwise, no one's gonna know you're here except for him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Right. I imagine the Gray Ravens have encountered the other "you" that\'s guarding Luna by now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Or your "sister"? Do your species call each other human names?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Well, it doesn\'t matter. What matters is you\'re "symbiotic" with the Polyphage.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'If I destroy you here, the Polyphage will fall into a brief moment of disarray from losing one of the terminals. I\'m guessing your "sister" will be affected too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I'm not sure how big an impact this will make, nor do I know if Gray Raven will manage to seize the opportunity...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland draws his weapon, and the Hetero-Creature across him immediately spreads its wings, its eyes blinking a menacing red as if it has detected a threat.'}

{2: 'Roland', 3: "So, this is how it is... You don't even hesitate to fight me as soon as I show a little bit of aggression, even if I'm an Ascendant. I watched you grow up, for crying out loud! I wouldn't mind a little respect.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I know it won't be easy taking you down, but I think I'm ready.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'So, while your "sister" is having fun with the Gray Ravens, we can have our own little dance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'You pathetic creature.', 4: '1'}
